title: "Machine learning tool helps create drought-resistant crops"
excerpt: "Researchers from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign created a series of imaging and machine learning (ML) tools to study plant characteristics. The goal of this research was to help farmers and plant researchers breed or engineer crops that can conserve water without sacrificing yield."
